1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: New series. Niall Breslin sets himself a challenge to create a teenage band made up of youngsters from Limerick, as a new way for them to express themselves.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Niall Breslin decides the rap scene is where the band should be heading, but has limited time and several obstacles to overcome before their first session in the studio.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Niall Breslin, aka Bressie, is on a mission. He wants to help Calvin, Nathan, Damien, Sherisse and Kelsey express themselves through music. It hasn't been easy keeping everyone on track - there's been break ups, walk outs and warnings. In less than six weeks time, the group will record their first ever EP in Windmill Lane Studios and then play their first gig in Limerick's premier music venue, Dolan's.

imdb.plot outline: Niall Breslin, aka Bressie, (The Voice of Ireland coach) has set himself the challenge of making a teenage band. He knows how to spot and nurture talent - but this time he wants to do it in a very different way in a place that's special to him - Limerick. A city with a troubled past, parts of Limerick have been scarred by unemployment and violent feuds - but now Bressie wants to shift the focus. Through his music and rugby career, he believes there is an insane soul to the city.
imdb.title: Bressie's Teenage Kicks
plot: Niall Breslin, aka Bressie, (The Voice of Ireland coach) has set himself the challenge of making a teenage band.::John

Niall Breslin, aka Bressie, (The Voice of Ireland coach) has set himself the challenge of making a teenage band. He knows how to spot and nurture talent - but this time he wants to do it in a very different way in a place that's special to him - Limerick. A city with a troubled past, parts of Limerick have been scarred by unemployment and violent feuds - but now Bressie wants to shift the focus. Through his music and rugby career, he believes there is an insane soul to the city.::John
